code: import{createAction,createRequestTypes,REQUEST,SUCCESS,FAILURE}from'./index';export var VIDEO_CATEGORIES=createRequestTypes('VIDEO_CATEGORIES');export var categories={request:function request(){return createAction(VIDEO_CATEGORIES[REQUEST]);},success:function success(response){return createAction(VIDEO_CATEGORIES[SUCCESS],{response:response});},failure:function failure(response){return createAction(VIDEO_CATEGORIES[FAILURE],{response:response});}};export var MOST_POPULAR=createRequestTypes('MOST_POPULAR');export var mostPopular={request:function request(amount,loadDescription,nextPageToken){return createAction(MOST_POPULAR[REQUEST],{amount:amount,loadDescription:loadDescription,nextPageToken:nextPageToken});},success:function success(response){return createAction(MOST_POPULAR[SUCCESS],{response:response});},failure:function failure(response){return createAction(MOST_POPULAR[FAILURE],{response:response});}};export var MOST_POPULAR_BY_CATEGORY=createRequestTypes('MOST_POPULAR_BY_CATEGORY');export var mostPopularByCategory={request:function request(categories){return createAction(MOST_POPULAR_BY_CATEGORY[REQUEST],{categories:categories});},success:function success(response,categories){return createAction(MOST_POPULAR_BY_CATEGORY[SUCCESS],{response:response,categories:categories});},failure:function failure(response){return createAction(MOST_POPULAR_BY_CATEGORY[FAILURE],response);}};
